item.title: 瑞士钟表预计上半年不会受到美国关税的影响
item.description: 瑞士手表公司（Watches of Switzerland）周三表示，该公司有望公布符合预期的上半年业绩，并补充说，这家奢侈手表零售商预计在此期间不会受到美国关税的任何实质性影响。【原文：Watches of Switzerland said on Wednesday that it was on track to report first-half results in line with its expectations, adding that the luxury watch retailer does not anticipate any material impact from U.S. tariffs in that period.】

item.title: 温克艾沃斯双胞胎支持的比特币财务公司将在阿姆斯特丹上市
item.description: 由美国亿万富翁温克艾沃斯双胞胎支持的荷兰比特币财务公司Treasury周三表示，计划与荷兰投资公司MKB Nedsense一起通过反向上市交易在阿姆斯特丹上市。【原文：Netherlands-based Treasury, a bitcoin treasury company backed by the US billionaire Winklevoss twins, said on Wednesday it plans to list in Amsterdam via a reverse listing transaction alongside Dutch investment firm MKB Nedsense .】

item.title: Blackstone 斥资 8.19 亿美元购入巴黎办公楼
item.description: Blackstone 周三证实，它已以约 7 亿欧元（8.19 亿美元）的价格买下了巴黎市中心的一栋高档写字楼，这表明投资者在经历了大萧条之后，开始青睐高档写字楼物业。【原文：Blackstone confirmed on Wednesday it had bought a trophy office building in central Paris for about 700 million euros ($819 million), in a sign investors are warming to premium office properties after a post-pandemic drop in activity.】

item.title: 泰国将组建特别工作组应对美国严格的贸易规则
item.description: 一位泰国官员表示，随着华盛顿对转运做法进行严格审查，泰国将于 10 月份成立一个特别工作组，负责管理根据正在与美国谈判的新贸易规则预计需要提供的数百万份原产地证书。【原文：Thailand will set up a special task force in October to manage millions of certificates of origin expected to be required under new trade rules being negotiated with the United States, a Thai official said, as Washington scrutinises transshipment practices.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁欧洲化学品复苏
item.description: 由于美国征收进口关税扰乱了全球贸易，促使客户推迟下单，并打击了正努力从该地区 2022 年能源危机中复苏的化工行业的需求，欧洲的化工生产商正面临新的动荡。【原文：Europe's chemical producers are facing fresh turmoil as U.S. import tariffs disrupt global trade, prompting customers to delay orders and hitting demand in a sector struggling to recover from the region's 2022 energy crisis.】

item.title: 大食品走向小规模：卡夫亨氏押注简约以提振股价
item.description: 知情人士说，投资银行家多年来一直向卡夫亨氏提出分拆建议，但没有成功。该公司最终同意分拆，因为它意识到，两家更简单的公司将更容易管理和理解，从而获得更高的股票价格。【原文：Investment bankers had pitched a breakup to Kraft Heinz for years without success, sources said. The company finally agreed to a split when it realized that two simpler companies would be easier to manage and understand, garnering higher stock prices.】

item.title: 花旗任命考斯图布-库尔卡尼为亚太区投资银行联席主管
item.description: 根据周三发布并经路透社审阅的一份备忘录，花旗银行任命银行业资深人士考斯图布-库尔卡尼（Kaustubh Kulkarni）为日本、北亚、澳大利亚和南亚投资银行业务联席主管。【原文：Citi has appointed banking veteran Kaustubh Kulkarni as co-head of its Investment Banking Coverage for Japan, Asia North and Australia, and Asia South, according to a memo issued on Wednesday and reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 新加坡命令 Meta 实施反诈骗措施，否则可能面临罚款
item.description: 一位政府部长表示，新加坡警方已下令 Meta 针对社交媒体网络 Facebook 上冒充主要政府官员的广告、账户、个人资料和企业页面实施反诈骗措施，以打击诈骗行为。【原文：Singapore police have ordered Meta to implement anti-scam measures against advertisements, accounts, profiles and business pages impersonating key government office holders on its social media network Facebook to combat scams, a government minister said.】

item.title: 早间竞价习近平的坦克滚滚而来，债券市场震荡不已
item.description: 洛基-斯威夫特对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rocky Swift】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，巴西开始调查英美资源集团 5 亿美元镍矿销售案
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，巴西竞争管理机构已对英美资源集团出售其在巴西的镍矿业务的计划展开调查。【原文：Brazil's competition authority has launched an investigation into Anglo American's plan to sell its nickel operation in the country, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，怡安正在洽谈以近 30 亿美元的价格将 NFP 财富业务交还给 Madison Dearborn
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引两位知情人士的话报道称，作为更广泛交易的一部分，保险经纪公司 Aon 即将以近 30 亿美元的价格向美国私募股权集团 Madison Dearborn 出售其 NFP 财富业务。【原文：Insurance broker Aon is nearing a sale of its NFP wealth business back to U.S. private equity group Madison Dearborn for nearly $3 billion as part of a broader deal, Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing two people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟与南方共同市场的协议有哪些内容？
item.description: 以下是欧盟与南美洲南方共同市场集团（Mercosur）之间达成的贸易协定的详细内容。欧盟委员会将于周三正式提出该协议，供欧盟议会和成员国批准。【原文：The following are details of a trade accord between the EU and South America's Mercosur bloc. The European Commission is set to formally propose the deal on Wednesday for approval by the EU's parliament and member states.】

item.title: 普华永道调查显示，美国假日消费将出现自大流行病以来的最大跌幅
item.description: 普华永道（PricewaterhouseCoopers）的一项调查显示，随着购物者（尤其是 Z 世代）在经济不确定性的影响下减少消费，美国消费者的假日消费将出现自大流行病以来最大幅度的下降。【原文：Holiday spending by U.S. consumers is set for its steepest drop since the pandemic as shoppers — particularly Gen Z — pull back amid economic uncertainty, a PricewaterhouseCoopers survey showed.】

item.title: 欧盟将提议南方共同市场贸易协定，面临法国领导的反对意见
item.description: 欧盟与南美共同市场集团（Mercosur 欧盟委员会将于周三提交欧盟与南美洲南方共同市场（Mercosur）集团的贸易协议供批准，这将使德国和其他希望获得新市场以抵消特朗普关税的国家与主要协议批评者法国及其盟国对立起来。【原文：An EU trade accord with South America's Mercosur bloc will be presented by the European Commission on Wednesday for approval, pitting Germany and other countries that want new markets to offset Trump tariffs against chief deal critic France and its allies.】

item.title: 韩国现代汽车工会就工资和工时问题发起罢工
item.description: 根据一份发给工会成员的通知，韩国现代汽车公司工会将于本周在韩国各地的工厂举行为期三天的部分罢工，以推动缩短工时和提高工资。【原文：The union of South Korean carmaker Hyundai Motor will stage partial strikes over three days this week at plants across South Korea, in a push for shorter working hours and higher wages, according to a notice sent to members of the union.】

item.title: 印度部长表示希望在 11 月前与美国达成贸易协议
item.description: 印度商务部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）周二在孟买举行的投资者会议上表示，印度希望在 11 月前与美国达成双边贸易协定。【原文：India hopes to conclude a bilateral trade agreement with the United States by November, Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal said at an investor conference in Mumbai on Tuesday.】

item.title: 韩国 LG Energy Solution 赢得梅赛德斯-奔驰的电池订单
item.description: 韩国 LG Energy Solution 公司周三提交的一份文件显示，该公司赢得了向梅赛德斯-奔驰公司（Mercedes-Benz AG）供应电动汽车电池的订单。【原文：South Korea's LG Energy Solution has won an order to supply electric vehicle batteries to Mercedes-Benz AG, according to a company filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 长债收益率上升，黄金因财政问题创纪录
item.description: 由于对政府债务和经济增长的担忧加剧，周三全球长期债券的跌势延续至亚洲，而黄金则攀升至新高。【原文：A global slide in long-dated bonds extended into Asia on Wednesday, while gold climbed to a new peak as concerns mounted over government debt and economic growth.】

item.title: 消费者打开钱包，澳大利亚第二季度国内生产总值增速升至两年来新高
item.description: 周三的数据显示，由于消费者在经历了长期的消费低迷之后终于开始消费，澳大利亚经济在第二季度以近两年来最快的年增长率增长，取代政府成为经济增长的主要推动力。【原文：Australia's economy grew at the fastest annual pace in almost two years in the second quarter as consumers finally started spending after a long fallow stretch, data showed on Wednesday, taking over from the government as the main driver of growth.】

item.title: 巴西利用全球市场出售 2025 年第三笔债务，创十年之最
item.description: 巴西财政部周二进行了今年的第三次外债销售，这是拉丁美洲最大经济体自2014年以来首次在一年内进行两次以上的外债销售。【原文：Brazil's Treasury on Tuesday made its third foreign debt sale of the year, marking the first time since 2014 that Latin America's largest economy has conducted more than two external bond sales in a single year.】

item.title: 英镑、日元受财政和政治忧虑拖累
item.description: 投资者对全球政府财政健康状况的担忧和日本政局的不确定性再次引发了大量抛售，英镑和日元在周三承压。【原文：The British pound and the yen came under pressure on Wednesday, following heavy selling stoked by renewed investor worries about the health of government finances globally and political uncertainty in Japan.】

item.title: 油价守住美国制裁带来的涨幅
item.description: 周三亚市盘中，油价持稳，守住了上一交易日受制裁推动的涨幅，市场期待周末举行的欧佩克+会议。【原文：Oil prices were steady in Asian trading on Wednesday, holding on to sanctions-driven gains from the previous session as the market looked ahead to an OPEC+ meeting over the weekend.】

item.title: 美联储理事库克称抵押贷款 "矛盾 "不能成为特朗普撤职的理由
item.description: 美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）周二更详细地阐述了她反对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统解除她职务的立场，称现在才因她在确认过程中披露的抵押贷款信息而解雇她为时已晚。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook on Tuesday laid out in greater detail her opposition to President Donald Trump's bid to remove her from office, saying it was too late to fire her for mortgage information she disclosed during her confirmation process.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美国财政部长将于周五开始美联储主席面试
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）将于周五启动一系列面试，以遴选下一任美联储主席，面试过程将持续到下周。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent will launch a series of interviews on Friday to select the next Federal Reserve chair, with the process extending into next week, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 九月重启暴露美国市场潜在风险，投资者人心惶惶
item.description: 本周二，劳动节非官方夏末假期结束，市场重新开市，华尔街的夏日平静被打破，投资者正准备迎接更多的波动。【原文：Investors are bracing for more volatility after Wall Street’s summer lull gave way when markets reopened from the Labor Day unofficial end-of-summer holiday on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国证券和大宗商品监管机构宣布联合开展加密货币行动
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）和美国商品期货交易委员会（U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission）周二宣布了一项联合倡议，以协调数字资产方面的工作。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission and the U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission on Tuesday announced a joint initiative to coordinate efforts on digital assets.】

item.title: 苹果和三星希望从谷歌搜索案中得到什么
item.description: 本周二，美国针对 Alphabet 旗下谷歌公司的搜索反垄断案作出裁决，对包括苹果和三星在内的手机制造商来说是一场胜利，法官称谷歌可以继续付费成为新设备的默认搜索引擎。【原文：A ruling in the U.S. search antitrust case against Alphabet's Google on Tuesday is a win for mobile phone manufacturers including Apple and Samsung , who a judge said Google can keep paying to be the default search engine on new devices.】

item.title: 交易日 "九月效应 "提前显现
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 大型科技公司如何应对美国反垄断诉讼
item.description: 本周二，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司在美国的一项诉讼中被勒令与竞争对手共享搜索数据，这只是美国反垄断执法机构挑战大型科技公司主导地位的主要行动之一。【原文：A U.S. lawsuit where Alphabet's Google was ordered on Tuesday to share search data with competitors is just one of the major efforts by U.S. antitrust enforcers to challenge Big Tech companies over their dominance.】

item.title: 美国法官命令谷歌与竞争对手共享搜索数据
item.description: 华盛顿的一名法官周二裁定，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌必须与竞争对手共享数据，以开放在线搜索领域的竞争，同时驳回了检察官要求这家互联网巨头出售其广受欢迎的 Chrome 浏览器的请求。【原文：Alphabet's Google must share data with competitors to open up competition in online search, a judge in Washington ruled on Tuesday, while rejecting prosecutors' bid to make the internet giant sell off its popular Chrome browser.】
